metadata.title: CVE-2022-45417 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Service Workers did not detect Private Browsing Mode correctly in all cases, which could have led to Service Workers being written to disk for websites visited in Private Browsing Mode. This would not have persisted them in a state where they would run again, but it would have leaked Private Browsing Mode details to disk. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 107.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 22.04, the firefox package is just a script that installs the Firefox snap

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
